text: Shaka Hislop (born 22 February 1969) is a former Trinidad and Tobago football player. He has played for Trinidad and Tobago national team. ==Career statistics== (C.S. = Clean Sheets) (Con. = Conceded) Club Season League League Cup1 League Cup2 Continental3 Other4 Total Discipline5 Apps C.S.
